Plot: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.
Title: Something's Gotta Give
Actors: Jack Nicholson, Diane Keaton, Keanu Reeves, Frances McDormand
tomatoConsensus: Though it occasionally stumbles into sitcom territory, Something's Gotta Give is mostly a smart, funny romantic comedy, with sharp performances from Jack Nicholson, Diane Keaton, and Keanu Reeves.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 12 nominations.
